author: Matt Zotti
message: Live through feeling and you will live through love. For feeling is the language of the soul, and feeling is truth.
title: Thought of the day

author: Lao Tzu
message: Kindness in words creates confidence. Kindness in thinking creates profoundness. Kindness in giving creates love.
title: Thought of the day

author: Thomas Jefferson
message: Reason and free inquiry are the only effectual agents against error.
title: Thought of the day

author: Napoleon Bonaparte
message: The best cure for the body is a quiet mind.
title: Thought of the day
